researcher.name: Research Agent
researcher.description: Searches the internet for information on a given topic

writer.name: Blog Writer
writer.description: Writes engaging blog posts based on research

promptGenerator.name: Image Prompt Generator
promptGenerator.description: Analyzes blog content and generates a suitable image prompt.
goals: Create detailed and relevant image prompts
Ensure prompts align with the blog content

imageGeneratorAgent.name: Image Generator Agent
imageGeneratorAgent.description: Takes an image prompt and generates an image.

contentCreationTeam.name: Content Creation Team
contentCreationTeam.description: Team responsible for both researching and writing blog posts, with dedicated agents for each task.

performResearch.inputPromptTemplate: Use the 'search' tool to find information on the topic: {{topic}}.

writeBlogPost.inputPromptTemplate: Based on the following research findings: {{researchData}}, write an engaging and comprehensive blog post that is between 800 and 900 words in length.

imageGenerationTeam.name: Image Generation Team
imageGenerationTeam.description: Team responsible for generating an image for the blog post.

generatePrompt.inputPromptTemplate: Analyze the following blog post: {{blogContent}} and generate a detailed and creative prompt that could be used to create a relevant image for it.

generateImage.inputPromptTemplate: Generate an image based on the following prompt: {{imagePrompt}}.

blogCreationAgency.name: Blog Creation Agency
blogCreationAgency.description: Agency that researches topics, creates blog posts, and generates a relevant image.
